lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Also contributing to reduced earnings were lower natural gas prices, primarily overseas, representing contract adjustments representing contract adjustments tied to falling product prices in 1986, the company said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: One time items aside, Exxon said, its first quarter results were stronger than 1986's final quarter which included several large asset sales and positive inventory adjustments.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The company said profits in the lastest quarter included a 26 mln drl restructuring gain from divestment of certain gold operations overseas, while last year's first quarter profit of 1.71 billion dlrs included the initial charge of 235 mln dlrs for its 1986 corporate reorganization.
